characters.character_description: A digital AI featured in the 'Borg Invasion 4D' attraction. The fact that this doctor is a digital AI (rather than a biological being) proves to be very important to the plot of the attraction.
characters.ai_qualification_explanation: The Emergency Holographic Doctor is a computer-based holographic AI system, created from electronic/digital components.
characters.benevolence_rating_explanation: As an Emergency Medical Hologram designed to help people, the Doctor is helpful and caring toward patients and crew.
characters.alignment_rating_explanation: The Doctor functions as intended, providing medical assistance to those who need it during the Borg invasion scenario.
